div.p: This value set does not contain a fixed number of concepts
div.h2: US Laboratory Observation Profile Observation Name Codes
div.p: LOINC codes. This value set includes all LOINCs

This value set includes codes defined in other code systems, using the following rules:

ul.li: Include all codes defined in http://loinc.org

name.value: US Laboratory Observation Profile Observation Name Codes

description.value: LOINC codes. This value set includes all LOINCs
